formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Defined Benefit (DB): \[ P_{0} = m \times YOS \times FAS \] \[ P = \begin{cases} P_{0}, & R \ge \text{NRA}\\[4pt] P_{0}\,\big(1 - r_e \cdot (\text{NRA}-R)\big), & R < \text{NRA} \end{cases} \] Final-average-salary approximation (growth \(g\), averaging over \(k\) final years, \(S_R\) salary in year before retirement): \[ FAS \approx S_R \cdot \frac{(1+g)\,\big(1-(1+g)^{-k}\big)}{k\,g} \quad (g\ne 0),\quad FAS=S_R \text{ if } g=0. \] If the pension has no COLA, convert to todayâ€™s dollars with inflation \(i\) over \(n\) years: \[ P_{\text{real}} = \frac{P}{(1+i)^n}. \] Defined Contribution (DC): \[ S_t = S_{t-1}(1+g),\quad C_t = S_t\big(c_e + \min(c_e, c_{cap})\,c_m\big),\quad B_t = (B_{t-1}+C_t)\,(1+r_n),\ r_n \approx r-f. \] \[ I_{\text{rule}} \approx \text{WR} \times B_n,\quad I_{\text{monthly}} = \frac{I_{\text{rule}}}{12}. \]
